受感染的輕木廚房水槽
block.adorn.trading_station.empty_trade: 這個交易站還沒賣東西。
block.adorn.trading_station.storage_full: 交易站的倉庫已經滿了。
advancements.adorn.chair.title: 大佬坐姿.jpg
advancements.adorn.sofa.title: 白日夢
advancements.adorn.sofa.description: 用羊毛和木棒做一個沙發！
advancements.adorn.trading_station.title: 市場上的一天
advancements.adorn.chimney.title: 磚與煙
advancements.adorn.stone_torch.title: 石製照明
block.adorn.terrestria.mossy_basalt_cobb: 生苔的玄武岩鵝卵石半磚
青苔玄武岩鵝卵石平臺
青苔玄武岩鵝卵石柱臺階
block.adorn.terrestria.mossy_basalt_bric: 青苔玄武岩石磚柱臺階
block.adorn.shelf.desc: 方便存放日常用品的地方
guide.adorn.topic.building_blocks.title: 建築方塊
guide.adorn.topic.chair.title: 椅子
guide.adorn.topic.chair.text: 椅子是礦工和農民辛苦工作一天後坐下的好地方。
guide.adorn.topic.chimney.title: 煙囪
guide.adorn.topic.chimney.text: 煙囪產生小煙雲。它們也可以疊放在一起，使它們更高。
guide.adorn.topic.drawer.title: 抽屜
guide.adorn.topic.drawer.text: 你可以把東西放在抽屜裡。它們不像箱子能裝那麼多東西，但你也可以把它們當作小桌子或裝飾用。
guide.adorn.topic.kitchen.title: 廚房方塊
guide.adorn.topic.kitchen.text: 廚房的平臺，碗櫃和水槽可以用來裝飾你的廚房。你可以把東西放在碗櫃裡。
guide.adorn.topic.post.title: 柱子
guide.adorn.topic.post.text: 柱子就像柵欄一樣，但它們不連線到其他柱子。
guide.adorn.topic.platform.title: Platforms
guide.adorn.topic.platform.text: 平臺在柱子上有一個薄的平板。
guide.adorn.topic.prismarine_chimney.tex: 海晶石煙囪在水下產生泡泡。跟其他煙囪一樣，您可以將它們堆疊在一起。某些海晶石煙囪也能產生氣泡柱。
guide.adorn.topic.shelf.title: 擱板
guide.adorn.topic.shelf.text: 你可以用擱板向客人展示你的物品。
guide.adorn.topic.sofa.title: 沙發
guide.adorn.topic.sofa.text: 沙發是個舒服的地方。如果蹲下空手使用，你可以在寬大的沙發上小睡一會兒。
guide.adorn.topic.step.title: 步驟
guide.adorn.topic.step.text: 柱臺階是平臺的較小版本。它們可以用來建造有柱子和平板的樓梯。
guide.adorn.topic.table.title: 桌子
guide.adorn.topic.table.text: 桌子是廚房和餐廳的絕佳裝飾！
guide.adorn.topic.trading_station.title: 交易站
guide.adorn.topic.trading_station.text: 有關交易站的資訊，請查閱交易指南。
guide.adorn.contents.title: 目錄
item.adorn.traders_manual.subtitle: 使用交易站
item.adorn.traders_manual.buying.title: 買入
item.adorn.traders_manual.buying.text: 你可以通過使用交易站和支付物品從交易站購買商品。
item.adorn.traders_manual.selling.title: 出售
item.adorn.traders_manual.selling.text: 建立自己的交易站非常簡單！只要把一個交易站放下來打開就行了。在左側，您可以設定產品和付款。右側的庫存將包含產品和付款。
item.adorn.deprecated_item.name: %s - 棄用
item.adorn.deprecated_item.desc.2: 你可以按 %s 來替換它。
gamerule.adorn:skipNightOnSofas: 在沙發上睡覺來跳過夜晚
gui.adorn.config.title: 裝飾
gui.adorn.config.option.skipNightOnSofas: 在沙發上睡覺來跳過夜晚
gui.adorn.config.option.showItemsInStand: 顯示標準物品組中的物品
在標準的原版物品組（創造模式標籤）中顯示Adorn物品。
gui.adorn.config.option.showTradingStati: 當你檢視交易站時，會顯示有關它們的資訊。
gui.adorn.config.restart_required.title: 需要重新啟動！
gui.adorn.config.restart_required.messag: 你改變了一個選項就需要重新啟動Minecraft。
advancements.adorn.buy_from_trading_stat: Buy items from a trading station.

advancements.adorn.shelf.title: Items within Arm's Reach
advancements.adorn.bench.title: A Seat to Share
advancements.adorn.table.title: No More Fences and Slabs
advancements.adorn.coffee_table.title: Tables Made Fancier
advancements.adorn.post.title: Not Quite Like a Fence
advancements.adorn.platform.title: Something to Stand On
advancements.adorn.step.title: Who Needs Stairs, Anyway?
advancements.adorn.crate.title: Packed Up
advancements.adorn.kitchen_counter.title: Furniture for a Home Cook
advancements.adorn.kitchen_sink.title: Everything and the Kitchen Sink
advancements.adorn.picket_fence.title: Picket Fence and Rambling Rose
advancements.adorn.stone_ladder.title: Miner's Ladder
advancements.adorn.nether_wart_coffee.de: Brew some nether wart coffee in a brewer.
advancements.adorn.all_brewing.title: Industrial Brewery
advancements.adorn.all_brewing.descripti: Brew every possible drink in a brewer.
advancements.adorn.everything.title: Master Decorator
advancements.adorn.everything.descriptio: Craft every decoration block from Adorn.
block.adorn.post.description: A bit like a fence post
block.adorn.platform.description: A post with a platform on top
block.adorn.step.description: A small step with a post under it
block.adorn.shelf.description: A handy place for everyday items
block.adorn.coffee_table.description: A smaller table for smaller needs
guide.adorn.topic.brewer.title: Brewers
guide.adorn.topic.brewer.text: Brewers cook various beverages for you to enjoy. Hover over the diagram below for details!
guide.adorn.topic.brewer.mug_slot: Your empty mug goes here, and it'll be filled up.
guide.adorn.topic.brewer.tank_slot: The tank on the right can be filled here.
guide.adorn.topic.brewer.tank: A tank for fluid ingredients. You can use e.g. water as a fluid instead of a water bucket.
guide.adorn.topic.kitchen_sink.title: Kitchen sinks
guide.adorn.topic.kitchen_sink.text: You can store water and other fluids in kitchen sinks. They are infinite sources of water, and the water can be cleared out using a sponge.
gamerule.adorn:skipNightOnSofas.descript: Allows you to skip the night when you sleep on a sofa.
gamerule.adorn:infiniteKitchenSinks.desc: Makes kitchen sinks infinite sources for infinite fluids like water.
gamerule.adorn:dropLockedTradingStations: Broken trading stations drop a locked version with their contents inside.
gui.adorn.config.option.showItemsInStand: Shows Adorn items in standard vanilla creative inventory tabs.
gui.adorn.config.option.showTradingStati: Shows information about trading stations when you look at them.
